title: who counters kled??
body: I think Vayne does but I'm not sure, anyone else, cause i know he is really strong so i was just wondering..{{sticker:zombie-nunu-bummed}}

replies.body:
Teemo yasuo trynd jax veig syndra fizz zed. Anything that can block his w, is mobile enough to dodge his q and e, can out tank his damage in trades, goes invulnerable or can outright burst him, things like veig can easily kill skarrl, then because he is so squishy without skaarl they can literally 1 hit him, eq veig literally needs to his qr and then w where kled will land because he cant dodge it or anything because of the .5 sec cd on his spawn (after landing), his stun also stops him using e and stuff. Syndra's (and other prolonged effects like fizz w or zed r) will last through the dismount and can kill him before he even lands.

Aka, mobile champs, assassins, and burst mages, tanks with enough damage to win a trade or auto attack blocks can easily fight him and win, but champions that are really squishy and need a window to kill him usually lose, so most adcs do usually die to a kled unless they are a bit tanky, have a damage buff (like jinx will lose most fights unless she has her q pre stacked) or is a late game, full build kog.
Teemo gets fucked by anything that can jump on him.

> [{quoted}](name=Icy Spectre,realm=EUW,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=vAOs67NJ,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2016-09-06T14:14:50.804+0000)
>
> Teemo gets fucked by anything that can jump on him.

and teemo fucks anything auto attack based, kled also weak to dot effects.

I would suggest not vayne, definitely not vayne. If you want to counter kled, you need someone with ranged poke, lane bullies, good sustain, non-mobility cc (blinds, supression, knockups), tankiness and dueling potential. My suggestions are sion, moakai, teemo, cho'gath and basically anyone along those lines. Kled excels at killing squishy targets with his high mobility, enhanced aa's and the extra tankiness skaarl gives him to allow him to go all in. Tanky targets like sion can generally win all in duels with kled if he has comparable health and with the heavy zoning and poke sions' ranged abilities give him, kled has alot of issues picking the engage and winning the fight, not to mention if kled can't win by enough of a margin to keep skaarl, he's going to die from sions' passive. Teemo can shut down kled's main damage source with a well timed blind and the cd means that kled won't be able to outtrade the classic toxic shot damage.

 Anyways generally kled is good against squishy mechanically difficult champions and bad against mechanically simple tanky duelists.
So pick Sion, Teemo or Cho'gath. (I would also suggest cho'gath as a good counter to riven, fiora and yasou since he's tanky but does alot of damage and the aoe silence is a pain in the ass for any champion that relies on outplay)

> Kled excels at killing squishy targets with his high mobility, enhanced aa's and the extra tankiness skaarl gives him to allow him to go all in.

> Teemo can

get countered by high mobility and damage, because anything that can jump on teemo, will fuck him over any day.

Blind him and walk away, kled's main damage source is his w, so if you blind him after he activates it, he can't use the increasing damage per hit of it, effectively neutering about 60% of his damage and it's on a long cooldown whereas blind is not. I said teemo but maybe not because the majority of teemo's I see just don't understand how to play teemo and you only counter him early as teemo but lategame he will kill you, yeah maybe not teemo then.
only one champ has a blind so that dosent work with anybody else

Well I never played against kled (except in special gamemode, so doesn't count lol, shrekt him with adc), so wouldn't really know.

Though late game teemo means that if kled hits a shroom, he has to back, because as far as I know, he can heal only to the point where he has max hp himself, without his pet or whatever that thing is.

EDIT: yes, I was right, he has to back every time or either waste time farming jungle, potentially hitting more of teemo's shit, and even then, mount comes back only with 80% hp.
im not sure how reliable the counters on op.gg are but your top 2 suggestions are literally the 2 champs he has the HIGHEST win rate AGAINST. kled main in disguise here folks watch out.

I don't see how kled is good against cho'gath or sion. That said I guess it depends on how you play these champions. Sion has a shield and lots of cc, zoning tools and some decent range and cho'gath is tanky with high base damage and again lots of cc and very good range. Sure they're not mobile but kled has a hard time killing/winning trades with them as well. For Sion in a defensive lane like this, I max my w then e, since q already scales off ad and the early shield and poke wins you the early laning phase. For Cho'gath I do my regular skillmax order for toplane, maxing e then w then q, giving the highest sustain since the silence is good for preventing kled from engaging properly with his joust (in much the same way I argue that cho'gath is good vs riven and yasou) and the knockup can be placed under you to disengage and allow you to walk back safely. His e spikes passing through the minion waves deter kled from csing and trading with you using his qw combo and so long as you aren't one of those idiots who wastes your ult on his skaarl, even though you're a tank he won't be getting the skaarl reset midfight.

i played into kled as sion and was demolished in trades because kled runs conquer meaning the longer the trade the stronger plus the mobility and ranged attacks kled has (q) and the triple extra damage burst ability make tanks void since true damage kite ability with the graves knockback from shotgun-mode and the fact he regains tankyness while you chase him since he attacks and runs away at the same time plus out sustains with the fact he dosent use mana and starts tanky since he has 2 health pools and gets a massive shield that buffes his damage essentially then you cant run since tanks are slow and he has a dash and ms buff ult so in what world did you lose

> [{quoted}](name=tbonelewigi,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=vAOs67NJ,comment-id=,timestamp=2016-09-06T07:36:16.485+0000)

> I think Vayne does 

Find me something that % health true damage doesn't counter and ill be impressed xD
here is where trynd excels spin auto kill thats that to vayne

Teemo.

As long as he has pink ward/red trinket and does not get stunned.

EDIT: now that's ironic, because pink ward/red trinket counters teemo.

Kled is countered by high burst damage or kiting such as Kayle or Akali. Fiora and Tryndamere work well too due to Fiora's outplay potential and high-sustain, and Tryndamere's ability to out-sustain anyone in a duel.
fogged is the number 1 trynd and is countered by kled so...

Unless you have CC, high burst won't do shit.

You need to be able to burst through his "higher hp" or shield, then immediately CC him after he jumps off, or he will escape/kill you.

How to counter Kled? Don't die to him.

He is more useless than Aatrox in late game teamfights short of a speed boost. Any effective peel nullifies everything he is made to do. Not to mention being deceptively squishy despite having two health bars.

Kled only becomes a problem if you feed him 5 kills before 20 minutes. Otherwise, he is a splitpusher, skirmisher and duelist at best. 

Sure he can drop your squishies 100 to 0 with just a Black Cleaver, but he has to get to said squishies to do so.

Kled is actually pretty weak when compared to other fighters, all aspects considered.
its hard to peel to a dash pullback grab while he buffes his team with ms through his ult
Don't forget that heals only affect his "lower health" (actual health bar, not shield). At least that is for soraka.
What about Jax, Irelia (tanky build) and Xin? Jax has got his block and stun, Irelia insane life steal and Xin life steal with a pretty damn good knock-up.
kled shreds tanks and sticks onto them 2 well to be countered by a burst like irielia or xin

Kled runs through anivia walls with his ultimate.

***k Kled. literally i thought he was gonna get sion'd with my wall, instead if you pop it right infront with a slight lead time kled goes invisble for like half a second and then reappears right on you. its messed up.
Shen

Anyone with a strong disengage, poke or CC.

{{champion:44}} also specifically has an ultimate that counters Kled's by nature of being a counter engage and him being forced to go all in.
kled counters kled

i heard gnar shits on him

or you can check here at the bottom http://champion.gg/champion/Kled
